description:
A mid-price derailleur with feature from Shimano® top-line components: a one-way ratcheting cam can be engaged to increase spring tension, so you can bounce down technical terrain without slapping or dropping your chain. Really nice if your suspension system puts chainstays and pivots close to the derailleur.

  • Aluminum construction
  • Direct cable routing reduces the risk of snagging in tight situations
  • Direct mount (hanger adapter included)
  • Provides fast and consistent shifting
  • SGS model has a long-length pulley cage
name: Shimano Deore XT RD-M786 SGS Shadow Plus Rear Deraileur
